text:
e="preserve">Kim Nam-chun (; 19 April 1989 – 30 October 2020) was a South Korean footballer who played as a defender. He was born in Incheon, South Korea. His debut club goal for FC Seoul was against Ulsan Hyundai in K League Classic on October 9, 2014.
On 30 October 2020, Kim killed himself at his Seoul apartment, aged 31.
